templates:discover.description: Discover App Builder templates to install

sort-field.name: sort-field
sort-field.description: which column to sort, use the sort-order flag to specify sort direction

sort-order.name: sort-order
sort-order.description: sort order for a column, use the sort-field flag to specify which column to sort

templates.description: Discover, install, or uninstall a new template into an existing Adobe Developer App Builder App

templates:info.description: List all App Builder templates that are installed

required-services.name: required-services
required-services.description: includes services required by a template in the output

templates:install.description: Install an Adobe Developer App Builder template

yes.name: yes
yes.description: Skip questions, and use all default values

install.name: install
install.description: [default: true] Run npm installation after files are created

process-install-config.name: process-install-config
process-install-config.description: [default: true] Process the template install.yml configuration file, defaults to true, to skip processing install.yml use --no-process-install-config

template-options.name: template-options
template-options.description: Additional template options, as a base64-encoded json string

args.name: path
args.description: path to the template (npm package name, file path, url). See examples

templates:remove.description: Remove an Adobe Developer App Builder template from the Template Registry

args.name: name
args.description: The name of the package implementing the template on npmjs.com

list.name: list
list.description: list templates that will be uninstalled

confirm.name: confirm
confirm.description: confirmation needed for clear (defaults to true)

templates:submit.description: Install an Adobe Developer App Builder template

args.name: name
args.description: The name of the package implementing the template on npmjs.com

args.name: githubRepoUrl
args.description: A link to the Github repository containing the package's source code

templates:uninstall.description: Uninstall an Adobe Developer App Builder template
